scripts.compile: npm i user --prefix user && npm i perms --prefix perms && npm i posts --prefix posts
scripts.removeNodeModules: rm -r user/node_modules && rm -r perms/node_modules && rm -r posts/node_modules
scripts.installModuleAlias: npm i -C user -S module-alias && npm i -C perms -S module-alias && npm i -C posts -S module-alias
scripts.addNodeModulesFolder: mkdir -p user/node_modules && mkdir -p perms/node_modules && mkdir -p posts/node_modules
scripts.prodCompile: npm run addNodeModulesFolder && npm run compile && npm run removeNodeModules && npm run compile && npm run installModuleAlias
